attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877252681. Comes with Sunroof
This awesome luxury vehicle is still very low mileage and in excellent condition. It is an amazing, quality engineered coupe, with great design and performance. This great vehicle drives incredibly well and has a fuel efficient and powerful engine.
Test drives are available, trade ins are welcome and finance can be arranged.
Please note that the advertised price does not include admin fees of R8500 which will be charged on all vehicles sold.

attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877252681. The Isuzu MU-X 3.0 ONYX 4X4 Auto offers comfort and capability combined to create a vehicle that looks as good in the urban jungle as it does on a distant mountain pass. it has an elegant and impressive interior, extra storage and completely redesigned engines.
This vehicle comes with a 5 year or 120 000kms warranty and a 5 year or 90 000kms service plan. Trade ins are welcome and finance can be arranged.

attributes.title: 2017 Toyota Auris 1.6 XI

attributes.description:
Please visit www.cbkmotors.co.za for a virtual tour of this car as well as our online showroom. You can also click the Finance Option to do a remote finance application and get pre-approved on the vehicle of your choice. She is exceptionally clean and mechanically sound with a service history and comes with the following features that include; Xenon Lights, Blue Tooth for calls, Leather seats & interior, USB & AUX, Air Con and much more. We take things a little more seriously at CBK Motors we do a full ABC Assessment on all vehicles. A: Body for dents, scratches and scuff marks. B: Overall Mechanical check over and C: Cosmetic and interior assessment for your buying pleasure! E&O 
COME AND VIEW!
Finance Can be Arranged! 
Trade-ins Accepted!
Please contact our friendly and professional sales team for assistance!
Office: 010 449 3410 
Patrick: 068 521 2876
David : 067 131 6474
Zander: 065 830 9133
(Should you require any AFTER HOURS assistance please call our landline, follow the voice prompt and Press 1 for sales and we will gladly assist you!)

attributes.description:
Finance can be arranged, Excludes administration, delivery and license registration fees, 160 point quality check, Very neat, Trade-ins accepted, Test drives welcome, Nationwide delivery.

Finance is available with all the major banks as we are approved dealers. Please come and visit our Used Car Manager and our Business Manager, they will be able to arrange a Taylor made Deal structure to match your pocket over a lovely cup of coffee at our Bistro. Trade-ins welcome and we pay top prices for good clean vehicles. First time to finance, our Finance and Insurance Manager will assist you step by step throughout your process. There are great warranty options available for this vehicle and other great products. Should you require further information or you would like to arrange a test drive please do not hesitate to contact us.
